bibl.title: The Concept of Salvation as Expressed in the Paintings of Al Bagawat Tombs, Al Kharga Oasis.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Iconography of Salvation as Portrayed in Tomb No. 30.
bibl.seg: KADOUS Ezzat Z.H., The Concept of Salvation as Expressed in the Paintings of Al Bagawat Tombs, Al Kharga Oasis.

Nicola BONACASA, Maria CASINI e Ahmed ETMAN (a cura di), Maria CASINI (redazione), The Culture of the Oasis from the Antiquity to the Modern Age. El Kharga, 22-27 October 1998. IV Italo-Egyptian Forum. [Atti del IV Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano] (Cairo, s.d.) pp. 197-204, 4 pll.
Introduction. - Iconography of Salvation as Portrayed in Tomb No. 30.
